chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is having the following issue:

Hello,
As of today, it's May 26th, 2024, and I still haven't received my order.
Can you please give me an explanation since the carrier doesn't know when my package will arrive?

Thank you for your help,

Hello Jeffery, you will find attached your prepaid return label. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that suits you best to ship your package. You can find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. Return preparation: 1. Follow the instructions for returning an article: See return and refund instructions 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Wrap your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging of the article: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item in a stable manner so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the interior and exterior of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of any issues during transport. Your return is ready to be shipped! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, The Back Market Customer Service, The Back Market Customer Service

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you're well. 

I'm contacting you because the tracking link shows that you received the parcel on 31/05/2023 and the customer wants a refund.

Can you tell us more?

We look forward to hearing from you,

Desiree, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have received the order and it is currently undergoing processing under our repair team. We will update you when it is cleared for a refund.

Regards,
JH

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you are well.

The customer would like a refund.

I look forward to hearing from you and hope you have an excellent day.

Desiree, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
